CustomField.description: Enter Public Group Name (Label), which is used to give access to Kanban dashboard. It is not mandatory, we can skip it if we want to give permission by using Permission set or Queue.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter Public Group Name (Label), which is used to give access to Kanban dashboard. It is not mandatory, we can skip it if we want to give permission by using Permission set or Queue.
CustomField.label: Public Group
